name: Seasons (Torben)
description:
I decided to go quite abstract with the rotation theme. So I decided to make the game about rotating the seasons to progress forward in time. 

Unfortunately I only had one day to make this project, so I had no time to create multiple levels. The framework to create levels is in place and I might revisit this idea and improve upon it in the future. 

Your objective is to reach the car, loosely based on Zelda: Majora's mask, as well as an in progress mechanic for another game I am developing I decided that the rotation of the seasons was a nice interpretation of the theme.

Move: A and D - Left Joystick Horizontal

Climb: W and S - Left Joystick Vertical

Interact: E - A Button

Jump: SPACE - B button
